name: Madden NFL 2001
description:
Madden NFL 2001 is a sports game developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon, 3d6 Games and Game Boy Color. It came out on 22-08-2000. Electronic Arts published the game. Madden NFL 2001 has a Metascore of 84, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Madden NFL 2001 on PlayStation, PlayStation 2, Game Boy Color and Nintendo 64.
